name: Modern Coffee Table
description: Elevate your living room with the Modern Coffee Table. Sleek and minimalist design, crafted with attention to detail. Features a spacious tabletop for decor and a storage shelf for convenience. Sturdy construction ensures lasting durability. Rated at 4.5 stars.

name: Leather Recliner Chair
description: Indulge in comfort with the Leather Recliner Chair. Luxurious leather upholstery, ergonomic design, and reclining function for relaxation. Perfect blend of style and relaxation. Rated at 4.7 stars.

name: Dining Table Set
description: Gather around the Dining Table Set for memorable meals. Complete set with spacious table and comfortable chairs. Contemporary design and durable build. Ideal for family gatherings. Rated at 4.2 stars.

name: Wooden Bookshelf
description: Organize your space with the Wooden Bookshelf. Ample storage for books and decor. Classic design blends seamlessly with any decor style. Sturdy and functional. Rated at 4.0 stars.

name: Sofa Bed
description: Maximize space with the Sofa Bed. Stylish sofa by day, comfortable bed by night. Versatile and perfect for guests. Sleek design and easy transformation. Rated at 4.8 stars.

name: Vintage Writing Desk
description: Rediscover classic charm with the Vintage Writing Desk. Spacious surface for work or study. Elegant details and built-in storage. Ideal for creating a nostalgic workspace. Rated at 4.6 stars.

name: Upholstered Ottoman
description: Add comfort and style with the Upholstered Ottoman. Soft upholstery and sturdy base. Doubles as extra seating or storage. Versatile and practical. Rated at 4.3 stars.

name: Bedroom Dresser
description: Organize your essentials with the Bedroom Dresser. Spacious drawers and stylish design. Enhance your bedroom's functionality and aesthetics. Rated at 4.4 stars.

name: Modern TV Stand
description: Upgrade your entertainment space with the Modern TV Stand. Sleek design and ample storage for media components. Contemporary addition to your living room. Rated at 4.1 stars.

name: Corner Sofa
description: Maximize seating with the Corner Sofa. L-shaped design for optimal space usage. Plush cushions and modern style. Comfort and elegance combined. Rated at 4.9 stars.
